title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Fundamentals of Ecosystem, Our Earth’s Environment, Human Impact on Environment, Resource and Environment, Environmental pollution, Management of Environment, Environmental legislation, Environmental Quality and Indicators, Environmental Planning and Design Guidelines.
